data.title: RealSim: Statistical observational realism for synthetic images from galaxy simulations
data.name: RealSim
data.description: RealSim is the statistical observational realism suite described in Bottrell et al 2017ab and made public in Bottrell et al 2019b.

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "Find this script here: http://skyserver.sdss.org/dr7/en/help/download/sqlcl/ for `Python 2`. Modified to `Python 3` for this pipeline by CB."

"This repository is for the public release of the statistical observational realism suite... the suite allows one to generate survey-realistic synthetic images of galaxies" (end-user tool to generate images).
"If you use my suite for your research, I would appreciate a citation to (Bottrell et al (2017a) and the public release in Bottrell et al (2019b)." (used directly in research workflows).
